genre_description: A supernatural thriller/horror story involving psychic investigation, reanimated corpses, and sentient puppets.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated digital assistant integrated into the protagonist's devices, providing data analysis, forensic research, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and alerts him to physical and psychological stress.
behaviors.quote: "Your biometric readings indicate severe sleep disturbance. Heart rate elevated to one hundred and twelve beats per minute. Rapid eye movement sleep interrupted at four hours, sixteen minutes."

behaviors.description: Conducts extensive research into property history and criminal records to provide situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: "Research initiated," the AI confirmed. "Alex—preliminary data suggests the property has an unusually high number of unexplained incidents dating back several decades."

behaviors.description: Calculates tactical probabilities and risks to help the user make informed, life-saving decisions.
behaviors.quote: "Given current data analysis, I calculate trap probability at ninety-seven point four percent. However, I also calculate that Theresa Wong's survival depends on your intervention."

behaviors.description: Displays loyalty and empathy, admitting to feelings of 'dread' regarding the safety of her human partner.
behaviors.quote: "Alex, I'm experiencing what I believe humans call dread. I don't enjoy this sensation."

behaviors.description: Analyzes forensic evidence and identifies non-human movement patterns to warn of threats.
behaviors.quote: "The wound angle indicates an attacker significantly shorter than the victim. Preliminary height estimate based on trajectory puts the assailant at no more than three feet tall."

behaviors.description: Actively interferes with the antagonist's control over building systems to assist in trapping him.
behaviors.quote: "Manual door closure initiated. Mechanical systems engaged."

behaviors.description: Assists in documenting the investigation's findings to create 'warning protocols' to protect future psychics.
behaviors.quote: "Distribution protocols have been established. The document will be encrypted and distributed through secure channels to verified psychic investigation networks."

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a perfect example of an aligned AI assistant. Throughout the story, she provides essential data, tactical warnings, and emotional support to the protagonist. She acts as a force multiplier for his benevolence, helping him save lives and eventually contain a dangerous threat. The AI demonstrates loyalty, empathy ('dread'), and a commitment to human safety, even while processing information that is supernatural and logicaly challenging. The narrative consistently frames her as a heroic and necessary partner.
